title: Tokyo Eye
overview: Tokyo, a cosmopolitan city, is constantly transforming, while creating the latest fashions and trends, and giving rise to unique subcultures. At the same time, it retains tradition, including a particular spirit from the Edo period 300 years ago. Tokyo Eye introduces the various charms of Tokyo in a magazine-style.The program provides information on tourism, trends, traditional cultures, daily lives and many other hot topics from the perspectives of both visitors and those who live in this diverse metropolis.Â Presented by Chris Peppler.
